english_example_sentence: You are not thinking about this difficult problem along with its solution.
russian_example_sentence: Вы не думаете об этой сложной проблеме вместе с ее решением.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz bu zorlu problemi çözümüyle birlikte düşünmüyorsunuz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz bu zorlu problemi çözümüyle birlikte ______.
